statements: DELETE FROM table_name WHERE column_name = value;
DELETE FROM table_name WHERE column_name IN (value1, value2, value3);
DELETE FROM table1 WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'John';
DELETE FROM table2 WHERE age > 30 OR location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM table3 WHERE (status = 'active' AND age >= 25) OR (type = 'admin' AND role = 'manager');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123 AND first_name='John';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%');
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1005 AND amount > 500;
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%');
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe')
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 3 AND product_id = 4;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'John%');
